dict.acceptation: 昂贵的，花钱多的；豪华的；

sent.orig: Their expensive gift placed us under an obligation to send a mare expensive one to them.
sent.trans: 他们贵重的礼物使我们感到必须送一份更贵重的给他们。

sent.orig: At the same time, his expensive army and failed trade wars with the Dutch proved expensive.
sent.trans: 同时，他的军队和与荷兰人之间的失败的贸易战也花费甚巨。

sent.orig: The horses are expensive feed, but it is even more expensive to care of them.
sent.trans: 饲养马匹是很贵的，而照料起它们就更加昂贵了。

sent.orig: The horses are expensive to feed, but it is even more expensive to look after them.
sent.trans: 饲养马匹很贵，而照料马匹就更昂贵了。

sent.orig: They sold the expensive penthouse and bought a far more expensive mansion.
sent.trans: 他们卖掉了昂贵的顶楼公寓，买进了昂贵得多的大厦。
